tools.name: TransENet
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based multi-stage enhancement for remote sensing image super-resolution
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for super-resolution of remote sensing images, utilizing a Transformer-based architecture to enhance image quality for earth observation tasks.

tools.name: pytorch_geometric_signed_directed
tools.one_line_profile: GNN extension library for signed and directed graphs
tools.detailed_description: An extension library for PyTorch Geometric specifically designed to handle signed and directed graphs, providing specialized layers and utilities for these graph types.

tools.name: pykg2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for knowledge graph embedding and representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for knowledge graph embedding, providing implementations of state-of-the-art algorithms for representation learning on graphs.

tools.name: DacKGR
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic anticipation and completion for multi-hop reasoning over sparse KGs
tools.detailed_description: A reasoning framework designed for sparse knowledge graphs, using dynamic anticipation to complete missing information during multi-hop reasoning processes.

tools.name: MetaKGR
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-learning framework for multi-hop reasoning over few-shot relations
tools.detailed_description: A meta-learning approach for knowledge graph reasoning, specifically targeting few-shot relations where data is scarce, by adapting meta-knowledge.

tools.name: CogKR
tools.one_line_profile: Cognitive knowledge graph reasoning for one-shot relational learning
tools.detailed_description: A cognitive reasoning framework for knowledge graphs that addresses one-shot relational learning, mimicking cognitive processes to infer new relations from minimal examples.

tools.name: HGB
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating and refining Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks (HGNNs), providing standard datasets and evaluation protocols.

tools.name: ConvE
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional 2D Knowledge Graph Embeddings implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of ConvE, a convolutional neural network model for knowledge graph link prediction. It serves as a standard baseline and tool for generating embeddings in knowledge graph reasoning tasks.

tools.name: MedReason
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and framework for medical reasoning with LLMs and Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A resource and framework designed to elicit factual medical reasoning steps in Large Language Models (LLMs) by leveraging Knowledge Graphs. It aids in analyzing and improving the reasoning capabilities of AI in the biomedical domain.

tools.name: NeuroGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic GNN framework for EEG seizure detection
tools.detailed_description: A framework for precise seizure detection and classification from EEG data using dynamic Graph Neural Networks. It captures spatial, temporal, and semantic correlations between EEG electrodes and brain regions.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a multi-modal representation learning framework for molecular property prediction, integrating sequence, graph, and geometry information of molecules.

tools.name: RulE
tools.one_line_profile: Neural-Symbolic Knowledge Graph Reasoning framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for neural-symbolic knowledge graph reasoning that incorporates rule embedding. It combines the interpretability of logical rules with the scalability of embedding-based methods for link prediction and reasoning.

tools.name: TAPE
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-to-LM Interpreter for Text-Attributed Graph Learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework that harnesses explanations from Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance representation learning on text-attributed graphs. It is applicable to scientific graphs where nodes have textual descriptions (e.g., biomedical entities).

tools.name: GraphEmbedding-TransX

tools.name: FusionDTI

tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting drug-target interactions (DTI) using a token-level fusion module to capture fine-grained information between drug molecules and protein targets.

tools.name: HM-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks for Molecular Representation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks (HM-GNN) for molecular representation learning. It leverages motif-level information to improve property prediction tasks in chemistry.

tools.name: TransE-TF
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE model
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight TensorFlow implementation of the TransE model for knowledge graph embedding. It provides basic functionality for training and evaluating TransE on standard datasets.

tools.name: SpectralEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating node embeddings from Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating node embeddings from Knowledge Graphs using Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) kernels and Graph Autoencoders. It supports variations like VanillaGCN, ChebyshevGCN, and Spline GCN.

tools.name: pyHGT

tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch Geometric based implementation of the Heterogeneous Graph Transformer (HGT) model, designed to handle heterogeneous information networks (HINs) often found in academic graphs and knowledge graphs.

tools.name: MINN-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction using mutual interaction neural network
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation for predicting drug-target interactions (DTI) by utilizing a mutual interaction neural network architecture to capture the interplay between drug and target features.

tools.name: molgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular machine learning in TensorFlow/Keras
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various Graph Neural Network (GNN) architectures specifically tailored for molecular machine learning, fully compatible with TensorFlow and Keras APIs.

tools.name: Rce-KGQA
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Chain Reasoning framework for multi-hop Knowledge Graph Question Answering
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline framework designed to improve multi-hop embedded Knowledge Graph Question Answering (KGQA) by introducing relational chain reasoning to handle complex queries.

tools.name: Euler

tools.name: Chemogenomic-DTI-Prediction-Methods

tools.name: DGL-KE

tools.detailed_description: An extension of the TransE model that incorporates entity type constraints to improve the quality of knowledge graph embeddings.

tools.name: ClusterGCN

tools.name: Bigraph

tools.name: pytorch-graphsage

tools.name: Mixture-of-Partitions (MoP)

tools.name: pytorch-rgn

tools.name: GPTrans

tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based model for graph representation learning that incorporates graph propagation mechanisms to capture long-range dependencies.

tools.detailed_description: An embedding model for knowledge graph completion and search personalization that utilizes capsule networks to model relationship triples.

tools.name: GNN-NoGE

tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based approach for link prediction in knowledge graphs, focusing on node-to-graph embedding.

tools.name: R-MeN

tools.detailed_description: A model leveraging Transformer-based memory networks to learn knowledge graph embeddings, capturing long-term dependencies in relational data.

tools.name: HAG-Net

tools.name: Gravity-GAE

tools.name: TransERR

tools.detailed_description: A translation-based knowledge graph embedding model that utilizes efficient relation rotation to model complex relations.

tools.name: BLP

tools.detailed_description: A model for generating inductive entity representations from text using link prediction objectives, bridging textual data and knowledge graphs.

tools.name: INDRA

tools.detailed_description: INDRA (Integrated Network and Dynamical Reasoning Assembler) allows users to collect knowledge from natural language and databases, and assemble it into executable models (e.g., PySB, BNGL) or causal networks. It is widely used in systems biology to automate the construction of mechanistic models.

tools.name: MolTrans

It models the interaction between drug molecules and protein targets by capturing substructure interactions, facilitating virtual screening and drug repurposing tasks.

tools.name: Graphormer-PyG

tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch Geometric implementation of the Graphormer model, a graph transformer architecture that effectively encodes structural information for graph-level prediction tasks, widely used in molecular property prediction.

tools.name: Geometric Vector Perceptron

tools.name: LinkPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine for graph link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A C-based implementation of the Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine (WLNM) algorithm for link prediction in graphs, as presented in KDD 2017.

tools.name: SEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for link prediction using Subgraphs, Embeddings, and Attributes
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the SEAL framework (NeurIPS 2018) which learns from subgraphs, embeddings, and attributes to perform link prediction in graphs using Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: MTransE
tools.one_line_profile: Multilingual Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Cross-lingual Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for cross-lingual knowledge alignment using Multilingual Knowledge Graph Embeddings (MTransE), enabling entity alignment across different language knowledge graphs.

tools.name: gnn-powerflow
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network solver for AC Power Flow calculation
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network application developed with PyTorch Geometric to predict AC Power Flow calculations, modeling power grid topology and physics.

tools.name: gnn_hierarchical_pooling
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Pooling mechanism for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of hierarchical graph representation learning with differentiable pooling, enabling multi-scale graph analysis.

tools.name: KGPool
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Knowledge Graph Context Selection for Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for relation extraction that dynamically selects relevant context from knowledge graphs (KGPool), enhancing NLP tasks with structured knowledge.

tools.name: ncats-adme
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction models for ADME properties hosted by NCATS
tools.detailed_description: The source code for the ADME@NCATS application, providing prediction models for Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, and Excretion properties of chemical compounds.

tools.name: BootEA
tools.one_line_profile: Bootstrapping Entity Alignment with Knowledge Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A bootstrapping approach for entity alignment in knowledge graphs, utilizing knowledge graph embeddings to iteratively label likely alignment pairs.

tools.name: KG-ICL
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Foundation Model for Universal In-Context Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model framework for performing universal in-context reasoning on knowledge graphs, enabling few-shot inference tasks.

tools.name: MultiKE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Knowledge Graph Embedding for Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A multi-view embedding framework for entity alignment that combines multiple views of knowledge graphs (names, relations, attributes) to improve alignment accuracy.

tools.name: OpenEA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Library for Embedding-based Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking library for embedding-based entity alignment techniques, providing standard datasets and implementations of various algorithms.

tools.name: TransEdge
tools.one_line_profile: Translating Relation-contextualized Embeddings for Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph embedding model that contextualizes relation embeddings based on edge interactions, improving link prediction and reasoning performance.

tools.name: muKG
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Multi-source Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for handling multi-source knowledge graph embeddings and their applications, facilitating integration of diverse KG sources.

tools.name: proteinsolver
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for protein sequence generation and folding
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based tool for generating novel amino acid sequences that fold into proteins with predetermined topologies, aiding in protein design.

tools.name: Attention-Gated-Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Attention Gates for Medical Image Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network architecture incorporating Attention Gates for improved medical image classification and segmentation tasks.

tools.name: KARE
tools.one_line_profile: Reasoning-Enhanced Healthcare Predictions with Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for healthcare predictions that enhances reasoning by retrieving and utilizing community structures within knowledge graphs.

tools.name: EPInformer
tools.one_line_profile: Gene expression and gene-enhancer link prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting gene expression levels and identifying gene-enhancer links, utilizing genomic data and machine learning models.

tools.name: PyTorch Geometric
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning extension library for PyTorch, providing primitives and methods for deep learning on graphs and other irregular structures, widely used in scientific graph modeling.

tools.name: PyKEEN
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for learning and evaluating knowledge graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for training and evaluating knowledge graph embedding models, offering a unified pipeline for dataset loading, training, and evaluation.

tools.name: gcn-over-pruned-trees
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolution over Pruned Dependency Trees for Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for relation extraction that applies Graph Convolutional Networks over pruned dependency trees, improving the capture of long-distance dependencies in text for KG construction.

tools.name: linkpred
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for link prediction in graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to simplify the process of link prediction in graphs, providing implementations of various topological and probabilistic predictors.

tools.name: lm-bio-kgc
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Knowledge Graph Completion using Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging pretrained language models to perform knowledge graph completion specifically for biomedical knowledge graphs.

tools.name: mkb
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Base Embedding By Cooperative Knowledge Distillation
tools.detailed_description: A library for knowledge base embedding that utilizes cooperative knowledge distillation to improve the quality and efficiency of embeddings.

tools.name: grafog
tools.one_line_profile: Graph data augmentation library for PyTorch Geometric
tools.detailed_description: A library dedicated to graph data augmentation, providing various transformation techniques to enhance the robustness and performance of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs).

tools.name: Know-Evolve
tools.one_line_profile: Deep temporal reasoning model for dynamic knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep evolutionary knowledge network that models the temporal evolution of entities and relations in dynamic knowledge graphs for reasoning and prediction.

tools.name: DeltaConv
tools.one_line_profile: Anisotropic operators for geometric deep learning on point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning method introducing anisotropic convolution operators for point clouds, applicable to structural data analysis.

tools.name: MultiHopKG
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-hop knowledge graph reasoning via policy gradient
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning-based framework for multi-hop reasoning in knowledge graphs, utilizing policy gradients with reward shaping to infer missing links.

tools.name: ConPLex
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A method for highly accurate drug-target interaction prediction that adapts protein language models and utilizes contrastive learning.

tools.name: EMOGI
tools.one_line_profile: Explainable multi-omics graph integration for cancer gene prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph convolutional network-based method for integrating multi-omics data to predict cancer genes with interpretability.

tools.name: unKR
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Uncertain Knowledge Graph Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for handling reasoning tasks on uncertain knowledge graphs, supporting various embedding models and uncertainty representations.

tools.name: KGReasoning
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Hop Logical Reasoning in Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for multi-hop logical reasoning over knowledge graphs, supporting complex query answering tasks.

tools.name: InfoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised and semi-supervised graph-level representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A method for learning graph-level representations via mutual information maximization, applicable to molecular graphs and other scientific graph data.

tools.name: LinChemIn
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing and analyzing chemical reaction data
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit that leverages the connectivity of chemical reaction data to provide actionable insights and metrics for synthetic routes.

tools.name: Kingdon
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolically optimized Geometric Algebra library
tools.detailed_description: A library for Geometric Algebra (Clifford Algebra) that supports symbolic optimization and compatibility with PyTorch/NumPy, useful for physics and geometric modeling.

tools.name: Fast-TransX
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient C++ implementation of TransE and extended Knowledge Graph Embedding models
tools.detailed_description: An efficient, high-performance implementation of TransE and its extensions (TransH, TransR, etc.) for knowledge representation learning, designed for speed and scalability.

tools.name: KB2E
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for Knowledge Graph Embeddings (TransE, TransH, TransR, PTransE)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of knowledge graph embedding implementations including TransE, TransH, TransR, and PTransE, serving as a foundational toolkit for knowledge representation learning.

tools.name: OpenKE
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source package for Knowledge Graph Embedding with PyTorch and C++ interfaces
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and efficient framework for knowledge graph embedding (KGE) that supports various models (TransE, TransH, TransR, ComplEx, etc.) and provides unified interfaces for training and evaluation.

tools.name: TensorFlow-TransX
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of TransE and extended Knowledge Graph Embedding models
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based implementation of TransE and its variants for knowledge representation learning, enabling integration with TensorFlow ecosystems.

tools.name: DeepPBS
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning model for predicting protein–DNA binding specificity
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework that predicts protein-DNA binding specificity by modeling the geometry and physicochemical properties of the molecular interface.

tools.name: TorchKGE
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based library for Knowledge Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for knowledge graph embedding (KGE) built on PyTorch, providing efficient implementations of various KGE models and utilities for training and evaluation.

tools.name: TypeDB Bio
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Knowledge Graph schema and data loader for TypeDB
tools.detailed_description: A specialized schema and data integration tool for creating a biomedical knowledge graph within TypeDB, facilitating the querying and reasoning over complex biological data.

tools.name: LibKGE
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible Knowledge Graph Embedding library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for knowledge graph embedding (KGE) focused on reproducibility, hyperparameter optimization, and providing a standardized environment for KGE research.

tools.name: torchlensmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable geometric optics and optical system design in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A tool for differentiable geometric optics simulation and optimization, allowing the design of optical systems using PyTorch's automatic differentiation capabilities.

tools.name: BioKGBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for AI Agents in Biomedical Science Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework designed to evaluate the performance of AI agents on biomedical knowledge graph tasks, providing datasets and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: GraphSAGE
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation of GraphSAGE for inductive representation learning on large graphs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive reference implementation of the GraphSAGE algorithm, widely used for generating node embeddings in large-scale biological and chemical networks. It supports inductive learning, allowing for the generation of embeddings for unseen nodes, which is critical for dynamic scientific data.

tools.name: GraphSAGE-Simple
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified reference implementation of GraphSAGE
tools.detailed_description: A simplified and easy-to-understand implementation of GraphSAGE. While less feature-rich than the main repository, it serves as a lightweight tool for quick experimentation and understanding of inductive graph representation learning in scientific contexts.

tools.name: RE-Net (dynamic-KG)
tools.one_line_profile: Recurrent Event Network for reasoning over temporal knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A solver for temporal knowledge graph completion using Recurrent Event Networks (RE-Net). It is designed to model the temporal evolution of facts in knowledge graphs, which is essential for analyzing dynamic biological events and interactions.

tools.name: BioNEV
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Network Embedding Evaluation Framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for evaluating graph embedding methods on biomedical networks. It provides a collection of datasets and standard implementations of various graph embedding algorithms to benchmark performance in biomedical tasks like link prediction and node classification.

tools.name: DKRL
tools.one_line_profile: Representation Learning of Knowledge Graphs with Entity Descriptions
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Description-Embodied Knowledge Representation Learning (DKRL). This tool learns knowledge graph embeddings by incorporating entity descriptions, which is particularly useful for scientific KGs where textual definitions of entities (e.g., proteins, diseases) are rich.

tools.name: DeepPath
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement Learning Method for Knowledge Graph Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning-based framework for multi-hop reasoning over knowledge graphs. It is widely used to find interpretable paths between entities in large-scale KGs, supporting tasks like drug repurposing and biological pathway discovery.

tools.name: CENET
tools.one_line_profile: Temporal Knowledge Graph Reasoning with Historical Contrastive Learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for reasoning over temporal knowledge graphs using historical contrastive learning. It captures the evolutionary dynamics of graph structures, applicable to analyzing time-series biological data and event sequences.

tools.name: DeepDrugDomain
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for drug-target interaction prediction and binding affinity
tools.detailed_description: A versatile Python toolkit designed for the preprocessing and prediction of drug-target interactions (DTI) and binding affinities. It leverages deep learning models to streamline computational drug discovery workflows.

tools.name: PLNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise Learning Neural Link Prediction for OGB
tools.detailed_description: A solver specifically designed for link prediction tasks on the Open Graph Benchmark (OGB), which includes large-scale biomedical networks. It utilizes pairwise learning strategies to improve prediction accuracy on scientific graph datasets.

tools.name: NeuralKG
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Python toolkit for Knowledge Graph Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for knowledge graph representation learning, supporting various KGE models (TransE, RotatE, etc.) and GNN-based models. It is designed to facilitate the development and evaluation of KG embeddings for scientific and general domains.

tools.name: PaperQA
tools.one_line_profile: High-accuracy RAG agent for answering questions from scientific literature with citation grounding
tools.detailed_description: An agentic RAG library designed to retrieve information from scientific papers (PDFs/text) and generate answers with precise inline citations. It minimizes hallucinations by treating search as a multi-step process involving evidence gathering, ranking, and provenance tracking, specifically tailored for scientific workflows.

tools.name: Medical-Graph-RAG
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based RAG system for evidence-based medical information retrieval
tools.detailed_description: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation system that constructs and utilizes medical knowledge graphs to enhance evidence retrieval and reasoning for medical question answering. It integrates structured knowledge (KG) with unstructured text to improve accuracy and provide evidence chains in medical domains.

tools.name: biogpt.cpp
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance C/C++ inference engine for BioGPT models
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, efficient port of Microsoft's BioGPT model using ggml, enabling high-speed biomedical text generation and analysis on consumer hardware without heavy dependencies.

tools.name: RAG-HPO
tools.one_line_profile: Automated deep phenotype analysis using LLMs and RAG
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for automated deep phenotype analysis of clinical information. It leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) to map clinical text to Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) terms.

tools.name: MedRAG
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Medical Retrieval-Augmented Generation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit and benchmark for Medical Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It provides unified interfaces for various retrievers and LLMs to evaluate and improve medical question answering systems.

tools.name: 3DMed-RAG
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal RAG system for medical consultation
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal medical consultation system (3DMed-RAG) that integrates text, image-text, and 3D medical imaging queries. It features domain-aligned negative rejection mechanisms and enhanced flowchart data processing for high-quality medical diagnosis and consultation.

tools.name: LingYi
tools.one_line_profile: KG-based Multi-modal Medical Conversational QA System
tools.detailed_description: A multi-modal medical conversational question answering system that leverages Knowledge Graphs (KG) to enhance response accuracy and context understanding in medical dialogues.

tools.name: SciTab
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and tools for compositional reasoning on scientific tables
tools.detailed_description: A challenging benchmark and associated tools for compositional reasoning and claim verification based on scientific tables. It supports the development of models that can verify facts against tabular scientific data.

tools.name: scientific-claim-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating claims for zero-shot scientific fact checking
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by AllenAI for generating scientific claims to support zero-shot fact checking tasks. It aids in creating synthetic data or test cases for verifying scientific information.

tools.name: SciFact
tools.one_line_profile: Models and data for scientific claim verification
tools.detailed_description: The official repository for the SciFact task, providing models (like VeriSci) and evaluation scripts for verifying scientific claims against a corpus of abstracts. It serves as a standard tool for scientific fact-checking research.

tools.name: Trust-Align
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for measuring and enhancing trustworthiness of LLMs in RAG
tools.detailed_description: A research toolkit providing datasets and methods to measure and improve the trustworthiness of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems through grounded attributions and refusal learning, specifically addressing hallucinations in scientific/factual contexts.

tools.name: RAG2
tools.one_line_profile: Rationale-Guided Retrieval Augmented Generation for Medical QA
tools.detailed_description: A medical question answering framework that employs a rationale-guided retrieval mechanism to enhance the accuracy and explainability of RAG systems in biomedical contexts.

tools.name: MultiVerS
tools.one_line_profile: Model for scientific claim verification against evidence
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed for scientific claim verification, capable of predicting fact-checking labels and identifying rationales from scientific abstracts to support or refute claims.

tools.name: webMedQA
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale Chinese medical question answering dataset
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset for Chinese medical question answering, collected from online health consultation platforms, serving as a resource for training and evaluating medical QA and RAG systems.

tools.name: diseaseBERT
tools.one_line_profile: BERT model infused with disease knowledge for health QA
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained BERT model that incorporates disease knowledge to enhance performance on health question answering, medical inference, and disease name recognition tasks.

tools.name: viBioGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Vietnamese LLM for medical and healthcare QA
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific Large Language Model fine-tuned for biomedical question answering in the Vietnamese language, addressing the lack of medical AI tools for low-resource languages.

tools.name: medAlpaca
tools.one_line_profile: LLM fine-tuned for medical question answering
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source Large Language Models fine-tuned on diverse medical datasets to perform biomedical question answering and information retrieval tasks.

tools.name: paperqa-zotero
tools.one_line_profile: QA tool over Zotero library documents
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool that integrates Large Language Models with Zotero reference libraries, enabling researchers to perform question answering and evidence retrieval directly from their collected scientific literature.

tools.name: OpenBG
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale open datasets and benchmarks for domain-specific knowledge graph evaluation
tools.detailed_description: OpenBG provides a suite of datasets designed for evaluating knowledge graph performance in domain-specific scenarios, supporting tasks like knowledge reasoning and completion.

tools.name: ThoughtSource
tools.one_line_profile: Central resource and toolkit for Chain-of-Thought reasoning data and evaluation in science
tools.detailed_description: ThoughtSource is a framework and data hub for Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning, specifically curating scientific and medical QA datasets (like PubMedQA) to evaluate and improve the reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models.

tools.name: metapaths
tools.one_line_profile: R package for similarity search in heterogeneous knowledge graphs using meta-paths
tools.detailed_description: metapaths is an R package that performs similarity search and analysis on heterogeneous knowledge graphs by leveraging meta-path based metrics, useful for omics and network biology analysis.

tools.name: DRKG
tools.one_line_profile: A comprehensive biological knowledge graph and toolkit for drug repurposing
tools.detailed_description: DRKG (Drug Repurposing Knowledge Graph) is a large-scale biological knowledge graph integrating information from six databases including DrugBank, Hetionet, and GNBR. It provides a rich dataset of entities (genes, compounds, diseases) and relations, along with a set of tools and pre-trained embeddings specifically designed to facilitate drug repurposing tasks using graph machine learning.

tools.name: OGB
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and evaluators for graph machine learning
tools.detailed_description: Open Graph Benchmark (OGB) is a collection of realistic, large-scale, and diverse benchmark datasets for machine learning on graphs. It includes specific datasets for bioinformatics and chemistry (e.g., molecular property prediction, protein-protein association), providing standard data loaders and evaluation metrics to facilitate reproducible research in AI for Science.
